sentences.en: And telephone banking remittances function can not be underestimated.
sentences.cn: 而电话银行的汇款功能也不能小觑.

sentences.en: But he obviously underestimated the credit crisis by buying his company.
sentences.cn: 但是这次他显然低估了信贷危机对于他所买入的公司的影响.

sentences.en: FARSIGHTEDNESS is an asset whose value should not be underestimated.
Grace:Well, % it seems that we underestimated the costs. According to the factory, it will cost about eight percent more than initially projected.
sentences.cn: 葛蕾丝：看样子我们似乎低估了成本。根据制造厂商的说法，成本会比原先计划的还高出百分之八。 。

sentences.en: He says that we've underestimated natural variability.
sentences.cn: 他说我们低估了自然的变异性。

sentences.en: He underestimated the work that went into the renovation.
I underestimated you. Never thought you were that good a handler.
sentences.cn: 我一直低估了你, 从没想到你是个优秀的赶尸人.

sentences.en: Moreover, the impact of Southeast Asia's financial crisis should not be underestimated.
sentences.cn: 此外, 东南亚金融危机的影响不可低估.

sentences.en: Persistence of iatrogenic atrial septal defect after pulmonary vein isolation - an underestimated risk?
sentences.cn: 肺静脉隔离术后残留医源性房间隔缺损风险是否被低估?

sentences.en: Seriously underestimated the current price, strongly recommended " buy. "
sentences.cn: 目前股价严重低估, 强烈推荐 “ 买入 ”.

sentences.en: Since every household has a TV, its influence should not be underestimated.
sentences.cn: 在几乎家家有电视机的今天, 电视的影响不可低估.

sentences.en: The country'sleadership had underestimated the depth of the crisis.
sentences.cn: 该国领导人低估了这场危机的严重性。

sentences.en: The effect of tariffs on import quantities may have been underestimated.
sentences.cn: 关税对进口数量的影响可能被低估.

sentences.en: The male ego cannot be underestimated in the online jewelry business.
sentences.cn: 在网上珠宝业务中,对男性的自我意识不应忽视.

sentences.en: The value of this work experience should not be underestimated.
sentences.cn: 这种工作经验的重要性不应该被低估。
他们低估了敌人的力量。
他们过低估计了他的才能.

trans.tran_cn: 对…估计不足，低估( underestimate的过去式和过去分词 )，对…认识不足（或重视不够），低估，轻视
